General.Name: E KOCREF CR REIT
General.Description: E Kocref Cr-Reit engages in the acquisition, development, management, and leasing of real estate properties. The company has elected to be taxed as a real estate investment trust. As a result, it would not be subject to corporate income tax on that portion of its net income that is distributed to shareholders. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Seoul, South Korea. E Kocref Cr-Reit is a subsidiary of ELAND RETAIL.Ltd.
